Description:
IntroductionYour Role and ResponsibilitiesThe right candidate will help maintain a deep understanding of market dynamics, develop business plans and business cases, and enable offering and Go To Market (GTM) readiness.
This role will require you to possess leadership and strong collaboration skills that will be applied across product management and cross-functional teams, and the ability to work through the technical aspects of new use cases.
You will be accountable for key outcome metrics, including user experience, market, and revenue, and operational metrics.Required Technical and Professional Expertise7+ years of IT experience.
2+ years in the data security or security domain or experience in product managementPreferred Technical and Professional ExpertiseExperience in product management or a product-management adjacent role (like technical product support for software products or QA experience for security offerings) and preferably some professional experience in data security or broader security domains.Job Details
